actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to exclude certain information in rape cases which relates to the victim's sexual behavior.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Code regarding rape to: (1) exclude or limit certain information which may be considered by the court concerning the prosecutrix's sexual behavior; and (2) make evidentiary corroboration of the prosecutrix's testimony unnecessary if such testimony, if believed, establishes every element of the crime of forcible rape. Applies these provisions to trials involving rapes committed within the special maritime and territorial jurisdiction of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to exclude certain information in rape cases which relates to the victim's sexual behavior.
